metadata.Title: CVE-2018-4299 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Multiple memory corruption issues were addressed with improved memory handling. This issue affected versions prior to iOS 12, tvOS 12, watchOS 5, Safari 12, iTunes 12.9 for Windows, iCloud for Windows 7.7.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-4299` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.22.2-1ubuntu1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.22.2-1ubuntu1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.22.2-1ubuntu1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.22.2-1ubuntu1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.22.2-1ubuntu1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37-gtk2 - 2.22.2-1ubuntu1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.22.2-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

notes.Note: jdstrand> webkit receives limited support. For details, see https://wiki.ubuntu.com/SecurityTeam/FAQ#webkit webkit in Ubuntu uses the JavaScriptCore (JSC) engine, not V8

criterions.comment: qtwebkit-opensource-src package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.22.2-1ubuntu1').
